Race.SpecificTitle: Winnfield School District No. 5 -- 3.12 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Winnfield School District No. 5 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Winnfield School District No. 5 of Winn Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and twelve hundredths (3.12) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (the "Tax") for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028 (an estimated $134,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of supporting, operating and maintaining public schools and school related facilities in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 3 -- 12 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Winn, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of twelve (12) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $650,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating facilities, equipment and vehicles for fire protection service and/or first response emergency service for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
